column2: This character is one of the Four Fangs, the most elite warriors of the Black Fang.
The three Dragon Generals of Bern are the highest-ranked commanders in the country's military, answering directly to the crown.
The three Wyvern Generals of Bern are the highest-ranked commanders in the country's military, answering directly to the crown.
Mage General is one of the three highest positions in the Etrurian army. It is traditionally bestowed on the best magic-user in the kingdom.
Knight General is one of the three highest positions in the Etrurian army. It is traditionally bestowed on the bravest general.
Great General is the highest military position in Etruria. It is traditionally bestowed on the most experienced knight in the realm.
